Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Evenborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Evenborough Way and Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Evenborough Way runs west from here, towards the commercial areas of the northwestern section of town. Rosecrest continues to the north and south, passing by the main entrance to Lyanden Castle. There is a large guard station on the east side of the road, preventing people from accidentally (or purposely) entering Lyanden Lake, which surrounds the castle.
